line_1: THE Pencil's glowing Lines and vast Command,
line_2: And Mankind rising from the Painter's Hand,

line_1: And Mankind rising from the Painter's Hand,
line_2: THE Pencil's glowing Lines and vast Command,

line_1: The awful Judge array'd in beamy Light,
line_2: And Spectres trembling at the dreadful sight,

line_1: And Spectres trembling at the dreadful sight,
line_2: The awful Judge array'd in beamy Light,

line_1: To sing, O! Muse, the pious Bard inspire,
line_2: And waken in his Breast the Sacred Fire.

line_1: And waken in his Breast the Sacred Fire.
line_2: To sing, O! Muse, the pious Bard inspire,

line_1: The hallow'd Field, a bare white Wall of late,
line_2: Now cloath'd in gaudy Colours, shines in State;

line_1: Now cloath'd in gaudy Colours, shines in State;
line_2: The hallow'd Field, a bare white Wall of late,

line_1: And lest some little Interval confess
line_2: It's ancient simple Form, and homely Dress,

line_1: It's ancient simple Form, and homely Dress,
line_2: And lest some little Interval confess

line_1: The skilful Artist laid o'er every Part,
line_2: The first Foundation of his future Art,

line_1: The first Foundation of his future Art,
line_2: The skilful Artist laid o'er every Part,

line_1: O'er the wide Frame his ductile Colours led,
line_2: And with thick Daubings all the Wall o'erspread.

line_1: And with thick Daubings all the Wall o'erspread.
line_2: O'er the wide Frame his ductile Colours led,

line_1: As e'er you spangling Orbs were hung on high,
line_2: Lest one great Blank should yawn thro' boundless Sky,

line_1: Lest one great Blank should yawn thro' boundless Sky,
line_2: As e'er you spangling Orbs were hung on high,

line_1: Thro' the wide heavenly Arch, and trackless Road
line_2: In Azure volumes the pure Aether flow'd;

line_1: In Azure volumes the pure Aether flow'd;
line_2: Thro' the wide heavenly Arch, and trackless Road

line_1: The Sun at length burns out, intensely bright,
line_2: And the pale Crescent sheds her borrow'd Light;

line_1: And the pale Crescent sheds her borrow'd Light;
line_2: The Sun at length burns out, intensely bright,

line_1: With thick-sown Stars the radiant Pole is crown'd,
line_2: Of milky Glories a long Tract is found,

line_1: With thick-sown Stars the radiant Pole is crown'd,
line_2: O'erflows, and whitens all the Heav'ns around.

line_1: Of milky Glories a long Tract is found,
line_2: With thick-sown Stars the radiant Pole is crown'd,

line_1: Of milky Glories a long Tract is found,
line_2: O'erflows, and whitens all the Heav'ns around.

line_1: O'erflows, and whitens all the Heav'ns around.
line_2: With thick-sown Stars the radiant Pole is crown'd,

line_1: O'erflows, and whitens all the Heav'ns around.
line_2: Of milky Glories a long Tract is found,

line_1: So when the Groundwork of the Piece was laid,
line_2: Nor yet the Painter had his Art display'd,

line_1: Nor yet the Painter had his Art display'd,
line_2: So when the Groundwork of the Piece was laid,

line_1: With slower Hand, and Pencil more divine
line_2: He blends each Colour, heightens ev'ry Line,

line_1: He blends each Colour, heightens ev'ry Line,
line_2: With slower Hand, and Pencil more divine

line_1: Till various Forms the breathing Picture wears,
line_2: And a mute Groupè of Images appears.

line_1: And a mute Groupè of Images appears.
line_2: Till various Forms the breathing Picture wears,

line_1: Celestial Guards the topmost height attend,
line_2: And Crouds of Angels o'er the Wall descend;

line_1: And Crouds of Angels o'er the Wall descend;
line_2: Celestial Guards the topmost height attend,

line_1: With their big Cheeks the deaf'ning Clarions wind,
line_2: Whose dreadful Clangors startle all Mankind;

line_1: Whose dreadful Clangors startle all Mankind;
line_2: With their big Cheeks the deaf'ning Clarions wind,

line_1: Ev'n the Dead hear; the Lab'ring Graves Conceive,
line_2: And the swoln Clod in Picture seems to heave:

line_1: And the swoln Clod in Picture seems to heave:
line_2: Ev'n the Dead hear; the Lab'ring Graves Conceive,

line_1: Ten thousand Worlds revive to better Skies,
line_2: And from their Tombs the thronging Coarses rise.

line_1: And from their Tombs the thronging Coarses rise.
line_2: Ten thousand Worlds revive to better Skies,

line_1: So when fam'd Cadmus sow'd the fruitful Field,
line_2: With pregnant Throws the quicken'd Furrow swell'd;

line_1: With pregnant Throws the quicken'd Furrow swell'd;
line_2: So when fam'd Cadmus sow'd the fruitful Field,

line_1: From the warm Soil sprung up a warlike Train,
line_2: And Human harvests cover'd all the Plain.

line_1: And Human harvests cover'd all the Plain.
line_2: From the warm Soil sprung up a warlike Train,

line_1: And now from ev'ry Corner of the Earth
line_2: The scatter'd Dust is call'd to second Birth;

line_1: The scatter'd Dust is call'd to second Birth;
line_2: And now from ev'ry Corner of the Earth

line_1: Whether in Mines it form'd the rip'ning Mass,
line_2: Or humbly mix'd, and flourish'd in the Grass:

line_1: Or humbly mix'd, and flourish'd in the Grass:
line_2: Whether in Mines it form'd the rip'ning Mass,

line_1: The sever'd Body now unites again,
line_2: And kindred Atoms rally into Men;

line_1: And kindred Atoms rally into Men;
line_2: The sever'd Body now unites again,

line_1: The various Joynts resume their ancient Seats,
line_2: And ev'ry Limb its former Task repeats.

line_1: And ev'ry Limb its former Task repeats.
line_2: The various Joynts resume their ancient Seats,

line_1: Here an imperfect Form returns to Light,
line_2: Not half renew'd, dishonest to the Sight;

line_1: Not half renew'd, dishonest to the Sight;
line_2: Here an imperfect Form returns to Light,

line_1: Maim'd of his Nose appears his blotted Face,
line_2: And scarce the Image of a Man we trace:

line_1: And scarce the Image of a Man we trace:
line_2: Maim'd of his Nose appears his blotted Face,

line_1: Here by Degrees infus'd, the vital Ray
line_2: Gives the first Motion to the panting Clay:

line_1: Gives the first Motion to the panting Clay:
line_2: Here by Degrees infus'd, the vital Ray

line_1: Here on the guilty Brow pale Horrors glare,
line_2: And all the Figure labours with Despair.

line_1: And all the Figure labours with Despair.
line_2: Here on the guilty Brow pale Horrors glare,

line_1: From Scenes like these now turn thy wond'ring Sight,
line_2: And, if thou can'st withstand such Floods of Light,

line_1: And, if thou can'st withstand such Floods of Light,
line_2: From Scenes like these now turn thy wond'ring Sight,

line_1: Look! where thy SAVIOUR fills the middle Space;
line_2: The Godhead op'ning in his awful Face;

line_1: The Godhead op'ning in his awful Face;
line_2: Look! where thy SAVIOUR fills the middle Space;

line_1: See! what mild Beams their gracious Influence shed,
line_2: And how the pointed Radiance crowns his Head!

line_1: And how the pointed Radiance crowns his Head!
line_2: See! what mild Beams their gracious Influence shed,

line_1: Around his Temples lambent Glories shine,
line_2: And on his Brow sits Majesty Divine;

line_1: And on his Brow sits Majesty Divine;
line_2: Around his Temples lambent Glories shine,

line_1: His Eye-balls lighten the Celestial Fires,
line_2: And ev'ry Grace to Speak the God conspires.

line_1: And ev'ry Grace to Speak the God conspires.
line_2: His Eye-balls lighten the Celestial Fires,

line_1: How chang'd from him, who came to be Betray'd,
line_2: And who for Man the precious Ransom paid!

line_1: And who for Man the precious Ransom paid!
line_2: How chang'd from him, who came to be Betray'd,

line_1: Who did on Earth such arduous Toils sustain,
line_2: And patient bore an irksom Life of Pain:

line_1: And patient bore an irksom Life of Pain:
line_2: Who did on Earth such arduous Toils sustain,

line_1: But Death and Hell subdu'd, the Deity
line_2: Ascends Triumphant to his native Sky;

line_1: Ascends Triumphant to his native Sky;
line_2: But Death and Hell subdu'd, the Deity

line_1: And rising far above th' Aethereal Height,
line_2: The Sun and Moon diminish'd to his Sight.

line_1: The Sun and Moon diminish'd to his Sight.
line_2: And rising far above th' Aethereal Height,

line_1: And now to View he bare'd his bleeding side,
line_2: And his pierc'd Hands and Feet, in Crimson dy'd;

line_1: And his pierc'd Hands and Feet, in Crimson dy'd;
line_2: And now to View he bare'd his bleeding side,

line_1: Still did the Nails the recent Scars reveal,
line_2: And bloody Tracks of the transfixing Steel.

line_1: And bloody Tracks of the transfixing Steel.
line_2: Still did the Nails the recent Scars reveal,

line_1: Hither in Crouds the Blessed shape their Flight,
line_2: And throng the Mansions of Immortal Light;

line_1: And throng the Mansions of Immortal Light;
line_2: Hither in Crouds the Blessed shape their Flight,

line_1: The fruitful Matron and the spotless Maid,
line_2: And Infants, with a longer Life repaid,

line_1: And Infants, with a longer Life repaid,
line_2: The fruitful Matron and the spotless Maid,

line_1: Stand round; and drinking in Celestial Rays,
line_2: On their REDEEMER fix with ardent Gaze,

line_1: Stand round; and drinking in Celestial Rays,
line_2: And all the Heav'ns resound with Hymns of Praise.

line_1: On their REDEEMER fix with ardent Gaze,
line_2: Stand round; and drinking in Celestial Rays,

line_1: On their REDEEMER fix with ardent Gaze,
line_2: And all the Heav'ns resound with Hymns of Praise.

line_1: And all the Heav'ns resound with Hymns of Praise.
line_2: Stand round; and drinking in Celestial Rays,

line_1: And all the Heav'ns resound with Hymns of Praise.
line_2: On their REDEEMER fix with ardent Gaze,

line_1: Each Bosom Kindles with Seraphic Joy,
line_2: And conscious Raptures all the Soul employ.

line_1: And conscious Raptures all the Soul employ.
line_2: Each Bosom Kindles with Seraphic Joy,

line_1: Not equal Raptures swell the Sybil's Breast,
line_2: When by the inmate Deity possess'd;

line_1: When by the inmate Deity possess'd;
line_2: Not equal Raptures swell the Sybil's Breast,

line_1: When Phoebus the Prophetic Maid inspires,
line_2: And her Limbs tremble with convulsive Fires.

line_1: And her Limbs tremble with convulsive Fires.
line_2: When Phoebus the Prophetic Maid inspires,

line_1: But whence this sudden Blaze of dazling Light!
line_2: What Mitred Brow is that, which greets my Sight?

line_1: What Mitred Brow is that, which greets my Sight?
line_2: But whence this sudden Blaze of dazling Light!

line_1: Forth from a stately Tomb he lifts his Head,
line_2: And to the Skies on Angels Wings is sped.

line_1: And to the Skies on Angels Wings is sped.
line_2: Forth from a stately Tomb he lifts his Head,

line_1: I know the Form — alike the Look and Mien,
line_2: Another WAINFLET in his Face is seen:

line_1: Another WAINFLET in his Face is seen:
line_2: I know the Form — alike the Look and Mien,

line_1: When will, alas! such spotless Worth be found?
line_2: When will a Mind with equal Virtues crown'd?

line_1: When will a Mind with equal Virtues crown'd?
line_2: When will, alas! such spotless Worth be found?

line_1: Fearless he sees almighty Vengeance rise,
line_2: And fixes on his GOD his guiltless Eyes.

line_1: And fixes on his GOD his guiltless Eyes.
line_2: Fearless he sees almighty Vengeance rise,

line_1: But now far different Scenes our Wonder claim,
line_2: Horrent with Darkness and Malignant Flame;

line_1: Horrent with Darkness and Malignant Flame;
line_2: But now far different Scenes our Wonder claim,

line_1: The labour'd Wall delusive Picture hides
line_2: And liquid Sulphur rolls in burning Tides;

line_1: And liquid Sulphur rolls in burning Tides;
line_2: The labour'd Wall delusive Picture hides

line_1: So Strong, so fierce, the painted Flames arise,
line_2: The pale Spectator views them with surprize;

line_1: The pale Spectator views them with surprize;
line_2: So Strong, so fierce, the painted Flames arise,

line_1: Believes the blazing Wall indeed to burn,
line_2: And fears the Frame should into Ashes turn.

line_1: And fears the Frame should into Ashes turn.
line_2: Believes the blazing Wall indeed to burn,

line_1: Hither in ghastly Crouds the Guilty haste,
line_2: Obscene with Horrour and with shame defac'd;

line_1: Obscene with Horrour and with shame defac'd;
line_2: Hither in ghastly Crouds the Guilty haste,

line_1: With haggard Looks the gloomy Fiends appear,
line_2: They gnash their foamy Teeth, and frown severe.

line_1: They gnash their foamy Teeth, and frown severe.
line_2: With haggard Looks the gloomy Fiends appear,

line_1: A stern Avenger, with relentless Mind,
line_2: Waving a flamy Faulchion, stalks behind;

line_1: Waving a flamy Faulchion, stalks behind;
line_2: A stern Avenger, with relentless Mind,

line_1: With which, as once from Paradise he drove,
line_2: He drives the Sinner from the Joys above.

line_1: He drives the Sinner from the Joys above.
line_2: With which, as once from Paradise he drove,

line_1: What shall he do forlorn? or whither fly,
line_2: To shun the Ken of an All-seeing Eye?

line_1: To shun the Ken of an All-seeing Eye?
line_2: What shall he do forlorn? or whither fly,

line_1: What would he give amongst the Just to shine,
line_2: And fall before Omnipotence Divine?

line_1: And fall before Omnipotence Divine?
line_2: What would he give amongst the Just to shine,

line_1: But oh! too late in Sighs he vents his Woe,
line_2: Too late his Eyes with gushing Tears o'erflow!

line_1: Too late his Eyes with gushing Tears o'erflow!
line_2: But oh! too late in Sighs he vents his Woe,

line_1: Vain are his Sighs and fruitless are his Tears,
line_2: Vengeance and Justice stop th' Almighty's Ears.

line_1: Vengeance and Justice stop th' Almighty's Ears.
line_2: Vain are his Sighs and fruitless are his Tears,

line_1: See! with what various Charms the Piece is fraught,
line_2: And with what pregnant Marks of Judgment wrought!

line_1: And with what pregnant Marks of Judgment wrought!
line_2: See! with what various Charms the Piece is fraught,

line_1: With how much Grace the living Colours glow!
line_2: Not brighter Colours paint the watry Bow;

line_1: Not brighter Colours paint the watry Bow;
line_2: With how much Grace the living Colours glow!

line_1: When the fresh Show'rs her various Lustre share,
line_2: And ev'ry Drop with Spangles decks the Air.

line_1: And ev'ry Drop with Spangles decks the Air.
line_2: When the fresh Show'rs her various Lustre share,

line_1: O! may the Painter's Labours never fade,
line_2: Nor wastful Time their shining Charms invade,

line_1: Nor wastful Time their shining Charms invade,
line_2: O! may the Painter's Labours never fade,

line_1: 'Till the first Dawn of that Eternal Light,
line_2: Which by his fruitful Pencil shines so Bright.

line_1: Which by his fruitful Pencil shines so Bright.
line_2: 'Till the first Dawn of that Eternal Light,
